## factory() function

Create a instance programatically

Signature:

```typescript
export declare function factory(overrides?: Bud.Options): Promise<Bud>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                                | Description |
| --------- | ----------------------------------- | ----------- |
| overrides | [Bud.Options](/api/bud/bud/options) |             |

Returns:

Promise&lt;[Bud](/api/bud/bud)&gt;

Bud instance

## Example

```ts
const bud = factory();
```
